descriptions.title: Dhāraṇī to Cure Diseases
descriptions.content:
Example Texts

  • phlegm (bad kan gyi nad sel bar byed pa'i gzungs)
  • consumption
  • swelling
  • indigestion
  • to stop blockages of various bodily fluids like urine, etc. (mchil ma/_snabs/_dri chen/_dri chu rnams sbyin par btang ba'i gzungs)
  • bile disease
  • eye diseases
  • hemorrhoids
  • leprosy, etc.
